sentences.en: At this moment of success I found only an unreasoning sense of futility.
sentences.cn: 在这个成功的时刻，我只能感觉到一种不理智的徒劳感。

sentences.en: He well knew the futility of trying to contend against witches, so he gave up discouraged.
sentences.cn: 他深知与女巫斗争是徒劳无益的，所以他灰心丧气地放弃了。

sentences.en: As with Sisyphus, the boulder was painstakingly rolled upwards only to tumble back down again in an absurd exercise of futility.
sentences.cn: 和西西弗斯一样，巨石费力地向上滚动，结果又滚了下来，徒劳无功。
